name: Sputnik (itch)
description:
In an alternate version of the year 1957, the Soviet Union sent Sputnik into orbit not only to show their superiority in the space race, but to spread communism to the whole world by broadcasting the Soviet Union anthem via satellite.

It's your mission to ensure that the satellite towers are always aligned so the signal is clear and the glorious motherland anthem reaches every person's ears, comrade. Don't screw it up, otherwise you'll be making an extended trip to the cold north!
